name: Curse Of The Grave
description:
Game Story: You are an adventurer taking on a commission from the guild to slay a monster causing problems at the graveyard. By completing the commission, you will earn enough money to pay for your kid’s birthday present. On your way out you learn that there is actually two monsters causing problems instead of one. This poses a problem for you since you only have time to defeat one of the monsters and you don’t know which one is for your commission. It’s up to you to decide which one to defeat so you can make it back for your kid’s birthday.

How to Play:

For keyboard:

  • -Move: WASD keys or arrow keys
  • -Jump: Space bar
  • -Attack: Left CTRL button
  • -Slide: Left Alt button
  • -Heal: Left Shift button

For controller (based off Playstation 5 controller):

  • -Move: Left joystick
  • -Jump: X-button
  • -Attack: Square-button
  • -Slide: Circle-button 
  •  Heal: Triangle-button

Art Design: Ansimuz, , Brackeys, Clembod, Jakub Varga

Sound Effects: Mixkit, Time Catch Sounds, Sounds Recorded

Background Music: JP Soundworks

Design and Programing: Kebiruto
